FromTheBlog.title: Blog
FromTheBlog.description: Here are the latest blog articles. Discover the latest news, tips, and advice from our team.

extensible.title: Extensible
extensible.description: Extend the application's features to match your needs. Our team is here to assist you.

packages.title: Package Management
packages.description: Manage and version all your packages from one place. Track changes and debug more easily.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Aiop offers a suite of tools (Expanding) to assist you in package maintenance, design, and production.

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Customize the behavior of Aiop and your projects to match your requirements.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work together on the same project remotely. Share your packages, resources, and knowledge among teams. Increase productivity and quality.

Benefits.title: Benefits
Benefits.description: Aiop saves you time and money.

list.title: Infinity of packages
list.description: Aiop is designed to handle an unlimited number of packages. Use package nesting to manage complex packages.

list.title: 3 hours -> 5 seconds
list.description: On average, our users reduce the package generation time from 3 hours to just 7 seconds with Aiop.

list.title: Knowledge sharing
list.description: Collaboration is at the core of Aiop. Share your declarations, packages, resources, and knowledge among teams. Gain clarity, productivity, and quality.

list.title: Debugging speed
list.description: Trust in automatic package generation. Reduce the chances of errors creeping into your packages.

list.title: Quality control
list.description: Ensure no surprises when generating your packages. Aiop allows you to validate your resources before generating them.

list.title: Versioning
list.description: Manage and version all your packages from one place. Track changes and trace them. Aiop also allows you to regenerate previous versions of your packages.

Clients.title: Developed by engineers for engineers
Clients.description: Initially, the tool is designed to generate packages specifically for embedded systems but should not be limited to that. Aiop is designed for and by software engineers, testers, delivery managers.

list.name: John Doe
list.description: John uses Aiop to generate packages for his simulation and testing environment. He will also be required to modify the project to add his features during development.

list.name: Robert Johnson
list.description: Robert uses Aiop to generate and modify packages for his simulation and testing environment.

list.name: Jane Smith
list.description: Jane initiated this project and uses the modifications made by developers and testers to generate packages.

list.name: Jarvis
list.description: The CI-CD will be able to launch package generation and perform continuous integration and continuous deployment.

Integrations.title: Integration
Integrations.description: Native integration of artifact registries and libraries.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.description: Get started now with the free version! No credit card required.

tiers.name: Pro
tiers.description: For serious projects. Includes advanced features and dedicated support. Currently, the Pro version is not available. Sign up for our newsletter to be informed of its release.
mainFeatures: All features of the free version
Dedicated support in addition to the community

tiers.name: Team
tiers.description: Dedicated solution for a team and/or company. You have personalized assistance. Contact us to discuss the price.
mainFeatures: All features of the Pro version

list.question: Why pay for a subscription?
list.answer: Aiop is offered to you for free for personal projects and open-source projects. For professional projects, we charge a subscription to cover infrastructure and support costs. We also offer advanced features for teams and businesses.

list.question: Why do I need to create an account to use Aiop?
list.answer: For personal and open-source projects, you do not need to create an account. For professional projects, we need your personal details to create an Aiop cloud account and benefit from plugins. We do not sell your data to third parties. Your email address is used only to contact you about your Aiop account.

list.question: Where are my personal details stored?
list.answer: Aiop Cloud is hosted on AWS and the data is stored in the EU according to your choice. Check out our security and privacy documentation for more details.

list.question: Do you offer promotions?
list.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for students and academics. If you believe your situation justifies a discount, please contact us at this email address.
